item.title: slint-ui/slint
item.description: Slint is an open-source declarative GUI toolkit to build native user interfaces for Rust, C++, JavaScript, or Python apps.

item.title: dart-lang/sdk
item.description: The Dart SDK, including the VM, JS and Wasm compilers, analysis, core libraries, and more.

item.title: nim-lang/Nim
item.description: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. Its design focuses on efficiency, expressiveness, and elegance (in that order of priority).

item.title: glebbash/LO
item.description: LO - small programming language targeting WASM that aims to be as simple as possible

item.description: a work-in-progress Ruby compiler, written in Ruby and C++

item.title: jqueiroz/lojban.io
item.description: A free and opensource platform for studying the artificial language Lojban.
